LanguageData.PlantTreeOak.label: oak tree
LanguageData.PlantTreeOak.description: A strong hardwood tree. Slow-going, but its wood is very strong.
LanguageData.PlantTreePoplar.label: poplar tree
LanguageData.PlantTreePoplar.description: A softwood tree. Grows fast, but yield little useful wood.
LanguageData.PlantTreePine.label: pine tree
LanguageData.PlantTreeBirch.label: birch tree
LanguageData.PlantTreeBirch.description: A northern tree known for its thin, paper-like bark.
LanguageData.PlantTreeTeak.label: teak tree
LanguageData.PlantTreeTeak.description: A very strong hardwood tree, used in ancient times to build sailing ships.
LanguageData.PlantTreeCecropia.label: cecropia tree
LanguageData.PlantTreeCecropia.description: One of the most common rainforest trees. Grows very fast, but yields little usable wood.
LanguageData.PlantTreeWeepingWillow.label: weeping willow tree
LanguageData.PlantTreeWeepingWillow.description: Ornamental trees that has long, thin branches the hang down.
LanguageData.PlantTreeJapaneseMaple.label: japanese maple tree
LanguageData.PlantTreeJapaneseMaple.description: These beautiful trees have branches that twist and turn unpredictably and brilliant orange and red foliage that draws the eye.
LanguageData.PlantTreeIronwood.label: ironwood tree
LanguageData.PlantTreeIronwood.description: Ironwood trees got their name from the legendary strength of the wood. This is the most commonly used material for making spears and tools.
LanguageData.PlantTreeCherryBlossom.label: cherry blossom tree
LanguageData.PlantTreeCherryBlossom.description: Cherry blossom trees are not just a good source of building materials, they are also one of the most beautiful trees to have in your lawn.
LanguageData.PlantTreeCamellia.label: camellia tree
LanguageData.PlantTreeCamellia.description: This small ornamental tree has beautiful flowers that have been known to stay healthy even through tough winter conditions.
LanguageData.PlantTreeAcacia.label: acacia tree
LanguageData.PlantTreeAcacia.description: Acacia trees are hardy and can grow in the toughest desert environments. They don't provide much wood and they have sharp thorns too.
LanguageData.PlantTreePalm.label: palm tree
LanguageData.PlantTreePalm.description: Palm trees are hardy and can grow in the toughest desert environments.
LanguageData.PlantTreeRedMaple.label: red maple tree
LanguageData.PlantTreeRedMaple.description: A soft wood tree. Known for it's red leaves.
